Text: Egan HubJust to confirm with you about activity with Egan Hub there was nothing for September production however there was a park and loan deal for October If this is correct could you please forward you spreadsheet with the details I have not received anything from Egan confirming this or billing me for any fees associated with this deal Also just to let you be aware of the imbalance left on the other storage activity that was bought from Columbia we had an ending imbalance of mmbtu due ENA If you need a copy of the Egan statement with this please let me know so I can forward a copy to you or whomever may need it Thanks Marlo Ps My daughter said thank you for her candy and pumpkins She enjoyed them immensely

NIGS its for the August production Forwarded by Marlo C JamesHOUECT on PM Marlo C James PM To Cora NRON Patrice L CT cc Sherry CT Subject NIGS There is an interconnect problem on NIGSNICOR deal Unify is only showing the purchase from Enron Energy Services at point name NIGNGPL Central Point The deal shows for mmbtu The sales to the transaction is missing Could you please look into this and let me know as I am trying to get this cleared Thanks Marlo Ext
